org.apache.james.nntpserver
Interface AuthService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AuthServiceImpl
public interface AuthService

Authenticates users and provides Access Control for User Commands.

Author:
Harmeet

Field Summary

          The component role used by components implementing this service

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

isAuthenticated

public boolean isAuthenticated()
Check whether the service is authenticated

Returns:
true if the user and password have been set and are valid, false otherwise

setUser

public void setUser(String userid)
Set the user id for this service

Parameters:
userid - the user id for this AuthService

setPassword

public void setPassword(String password)
Set the password for this service

Parameters:
password - the password for this AuthService

isAuthorized

public boolean isAuthorized(String command)
Check whether the service is authenticated

Returns:
true if the user is authenticated and is authorized to execute this command
